name: Airship Funk (Proof of Concept Demo)
description:
Featuring 6 bit-sized microgames, Airship Funk was a WarioWare style game prototype originally developed over a three day period for Abertay Midsummer Jam 2018. This is an updated version of the end of jam build, featuring several quality of life improvements.

While the team did had plans to work on this further, the project is currently on hold indefinitely.

Controlled with the arrow keys and space bar.

Credits:
  • James Rodgers - Audio (Twitter, YouTube)
  • Jay Thomson - Microgame Code, Microgame Design, Microgame Art (Twitter, itch.io)
  • Callum Mackay (Myself) - Systems, UI, Microgame  Design,  Microgame Art (Twitter)
Known Issues:
  • The difficulty speed scaling can increase to the point where the baseball microgame becomes unwinnable
  • There is no visual indication that the player has failed the duck microgame
  • In the "ball and boxes" microgame, the in-between microgame transition screen can still be seen
